page.title: 17This Area 50 Years On
page.content: Our class of thirty pupils conducted a survey of parents into what they thought would happen to this area in the next fifty years.This is what they thought. Old houses would be knocked down and modern houses built,the modern houses will be heated by solar heating.They thought recreation halls and entertainment for young people would be built.People thought Kells would expand into a town and it would have better shopping facilities,a library,a larger school and a health centre.They also thought the Dying factory and the Woollen Mill would close down.
